explains: n. 折中，妥协；妥协方案，折中办法
v. 妥协，让步；危及，损害
wordGroup: reach a compromise 达成妥协
make a compromise 妥协；折衷；做出让步
missouri compromise 密苏里妥协案

sentences.en: I refuse to compromise my principles.
sentences.cn: 我拒绝在原则问题上妥协。

sentences.en: Neither side is prepared to compromise.
Compromise is an inevitable part of life.
sentences.cn: 妥协是生活不可避免的一部分。
